TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextPatternRange extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 容器中的一块连续文本。

span.span: Represents a span of continuous text in a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可以表示插入点、 一个子集，或中的文本的所有容器。A can represent an insertion point, a subset, or all of the text in a container. 一个将变为无效，如果发生下列任一种情况： 中的文本容器更改由于某些用户活动，或方法的用于以编程方式更改中的文本值容器。A will become invalid if one of the following occurs: the text in the container changes because of some user activity, or the method of is used to programmatically change the value of the text in the container.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddToSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 添加到突出显示文本集合中，该集合位于支持多个不连续选择的文本容器中。

span.span: Adds to the collection of highlighted text in a text container that supports multiple, disjoint selections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本插入点移动到新选择的区域。The text insertion point moves to the area of the new selection. 提供的退化文本范围移动插入点。Providing a degenerate text range moves the insertion point.

exception.span: 如果文本提供程序不支持选择多个不连续的文本范围（例如， 的值必须为 ）。

span.span: If text provider does not support multiple, disjoint selections (for example, must have a value of ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或者，创建一个新从和移动两个终结点以与原始的文本范围的终结点一致。Alternatively, create a new from the and move the two endpoints to correspond with the endpoints of the original text range. 新的范围可以从原始独立操作。The new range can be manipulated independently from the original. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1060](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1060)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2060](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2060)]

returns.span: 如果调用方的端点在文本中比目标端点先出现，则返回一个负值。

span.span: Returns a negative value if the caller's endpoint occurs earlier in the text than the target endpoint.

returns.span: 如果调用方的端点与目标端点处于同一位置，则返回零。

span.span: Returns zero if the caller's endpoint is at the same location as the target endpoint.

returns.span: 如果调用方的端点在文本中比目标端点后出现，则返回一个正值。

span.span: Returns a positive value if the caller's endpoint occurs later in the text than the target endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过比较相同的文本范围的起始和结束终结点可以识别退化文本范围是否或终结点是按逻辑文本流的顺序。By comparing the starting and ending endpoints of the same text range you can identify if a text range is degenerate or if the endpoints are in the order of logical text flow. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1062](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1062)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2062](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2062)]

exception.span: 如果范围来自其他容器。

span.span: If range is from another container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExpandToEnclosingUnit(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit) cil managed

param.name: unit
param.span: 文本单位。

span.span: The textual unit.

summary.span: 将文本范围扩展到指定的 。

span.span: Expands the text range to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果范围已指定的单位的确切数量将保持不变。If the range is already an exact quantity of the specified units then it remains unchanged. 为了使方法成功执行，在后台执行的操作序列。In order for the method to execute successfully, a sequence of actions is performed behind the scenes. 1. 规范化文本范围;也就是说，将文本范围折叠为退化范围，在终结点，使终结点成为多余。The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the endpoint, making the endpoint superfluous. 此步骤是必需的文本范围跨越的情况下消除歧义`unit`边界; 例如，"{The U} RL [ https://www.microsoft.com/ ](https://www.microsoft.com/)文本中嵌入"其中"{"和"}"是文本范围的终结点。This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints. 2. 生成的范围在 中向后移动到所请求的 `unit` 边界的开头。The resulting range is moved backward in the to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary. 3. 范围在 中向前或向后移动所请求的 `unit` 边界的数目。The range is moved forward or backward in the by the requested number of `unit` boundaries. 4. 然后通过将 终结点移动一个所请求的 `unit` 边界，范围从退化范围状态扩展开来。The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary. ![范围通过 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 进行的调整](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "范围通过 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 进行的调整")![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") 如何针对 Move() 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 调整文本范围的示例Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() > [!NOTE] > 这些步骤是必要的因为它是常见的屏幕读取器读取出全字、 句子或在插入点或任何虚拟的光标位置处的整个段落。These steps are necessary since it is common for a screen reader to read out a full word, sentence, or entire paragraph at the insertion point or any virtual cursor position. 尊重隐藏和显示文本。 respects both hidden and visible text. UI 自动化客户端可以检查文本可见性。The UI Automation client can check the for text visibility. 将推迟到下一个最大支持的如果给定控件不支持。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 顺序，从最小单位到最大值，如下所示。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - - ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1063](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1063)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2063](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2063)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏和显示的文本之间没有差异。There is no differentiation between hidden and visible text. UI 自动化客户端可以使用检查文本可见性。UI Automation clients can use to check text visibility. > [!NOTE] > 使用要搜索整个文档。Use to search the entire document. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1064](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1064)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2064](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2064)]

summary.span: 返回整个文本范围内指定特性的值。

span.span: Returns the value of the specified attribute.

returns.span: 例如，GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.FontNameAttribute) 将返回一个表示文本范围的字体名称（如果唯一）的字符串，而 GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.IsItalicAttribute) 将返回一个布尔值。

span.span: For example, GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.FontNameAttribute) would return a string that represents the font name, if unique, of the text range while GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.IsItalicAttribute) would return a boolean.

returns.span: 如果指定特性的值在文本范围内会发生变化，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the value of the specified attribute varies over the text range.

returns.span: 如果提供程序或控件不支持指定的特性，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the specified attribute is not supported by the provider or the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏和显示的文本之间没有差异。There is no differentiation between hidden and visible text. UI 自动化客户端可以使用检查文本可见性。UI Automation clients can use to check text visibility. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1066](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1066)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2066](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2066)]

span.span: An empty array for a text range that has screen coordinates placing it completely off-screen, scrolled out of view, or obscured by an overlapping window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封闭，通常提供该文本范围的文本提供程序。The enclosing , typically the text provider that supplies the text range. 但是，如果文本提供程序支持表格或超链接这样的子元素，那么包含元素可能为文本提供程序的子代。However, if the text provider supports child elements such as tables or hyperlinks, then the enclosing element could be a descendant of the text provider. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1069](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1069)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2069](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2069)]

summary.span: 返回文本范围的纯文本。

span.span: Returns the plain text of the text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尊重隐藏和显示文本。 respects both hidden and visible text. UI 自动化客户端可以检查文本可见性。The UI Automation client can check the for text visibility. 如果`maxLength`大于长度的调用方的文本范围，返回的字符串将文本范围的纯文本。If `maxLength` is greater than the length of the text span of the caller, the string returned will be the plain text of the text range. 不会影响文本流中; 中的终结点的顺序之间的逻辑文本流顺序中的文本范围的开始和结束终结点，它将始终返回文本。 will not be affected by the order of endpoints in the text flow; it will always return the text between the Start and End endpoints of the text range in the logical text flow order. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1070](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1070)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2070](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2070)]

span.span: If is less than -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Move (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 Move(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function Move (unit As TextUnit, count As Integer) As Integer

param.name: unit
param.span: 文本单位的边界。

span.span: The text unit boundary.

param.name: count
param.span: 要移动的文本单位数。

span.span: The number of text units to move.

param.span: 正值表示将文本范围向前移动，负值则表示向后移动文本范围，如果为 0，则不会进行任何移动。

span.span: A positive value moves the text range forward, a negative value moves the text range backward, and 0 has no effect.

summary.span: 将文本范围移动指定数量的文本单位。

span.span: Moves the text range the specified number of text units.

returns.span: 实际移动的单位数。

span.span: The number of units actually moved.

returns.span: 如果新的文本范围端点大于或小于 端点，则它可能小于请求移动的单位数。

span.span: This can be less than the number requested if either of the new text range endpoints is greater than or less than the endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要遍历文本范围的内容，为使 方法成功执行，将在后台进行一系列步骤。When it is necessary to traverse the content of a text range, a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the method to execute successfully. 1. 对文本范围进行了规范化。也就是说，已在 终结点将文本范围折叠为退化范围，这使得 终结点成为多余。The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the endpoint, which makes the endpoint superfluous. 此步骤是必需的文本范围跨越的情况下消除歧义`unit`边界; 例如，"{The U} RL [ https://www.microsoft.com/ ](https://www.microsoft.com/)文本中嵌入"其中"{"和"}"是文本范围的终结点。This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints. 2. 生成的范围在 中向后移动到所请求的 `unit` 边界的开头。The resulting range is moved backward in the to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary. 3. 范围在 中向前或向后移动所请求的 `unit` 边界的数目。The range is moved forward or backward in the by the requested number of `unit` boundaries. 4. 然后通过将 终结点移动一个所请求的 `unit` 边界，范围从退化范围状态扩展开来。The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary. ![范围通过 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 进行的调整](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "范围通过 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 进行的调整")![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") 如何针对 Move() 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 调整文本范围的示例Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 文本容器和嵌入对象（如超链接或表格单元格）的文本内容（或内部文本）在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 树的控件视图和内容视图中作为单个连续文本流公开，对象边界被忽略。The textual content (or inner text) of a text container and an embedded object, such as a hyperlink or table cell, is exposed as a single, continuous text stream in both the control view and the content view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree; object boundaries are ignored. 如果 UI 自动化客户端检索文本的目的是以某种方式进行叙述、解释或分析，则应检查文本范围中的特殊情况，例如含有文本内容或其他嵌入对象的表格。If a UI Automation client is retrieving the text for the purpose of reciting, interpreting, or analyzing in some manner, the text range should be checked for special cases, such as a table with textual content or other embedded objects. 这可以通过调用来实现来获取每个嵌入对象，然后再调用以获取每个元素; 的文本范围已检索到所有文本内容之前这是以递归方式。This can be accomplished by calling to obtain an for each embedded object and then calling to obtain a text range for each element; this is done recursively until all textual content has been retrieved. ![文本范围跨越的嵌入对象。](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "文本范围跨越的嵌入对象。")![Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.") 含有嵌入对象及其范围跨度的文本流示例Example of a text stream with embedded objects and their range spans 尊重隐藏和显示文本。 respects both hidden and visible text. UI 自动化客户端可以检查文本可见性。The UI Automation client can check the for text visibility. 将推迟到下一个最大支持的如果给定控件不支持。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 顺序，从最小单位到最大值，如下所示。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 文本不以任何方式更改，因为文本范围只是跨越不同部分文本。The text is not altered in any way as the text range just spans a different part of the text. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#StartTarget](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#starttarget)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#StartTarget](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#starttarget)] [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#gettextelement)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#gettextelement)] [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#MoveSelection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#moveselection)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#MoveSelection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#moveselection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void MoveEndpointByRange (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange targetRange, System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint targetEndpoint);

.method public hidebysig instance void MoveEndpointByRange(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange targetRange, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint targetEndpoint) cil managed
Public Sub MoveEndpointByRange (endpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint, targetRange As TextPatternRange, targetEndpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint)

param.name: endpoint
param.span: 要移动的端点。

span.span: The endpoint to move.

param.name: targetRange
param.span: 同一文本提供程序中的另一个范围。

span.span: Another range from the same text provider.

param.name: targetEndpoint
param.span: 另一个范围中的端点。

span.span: An endpoint on the other range.

summary.span: 将文本范围的一个端点移动到第二个文本范围的指定端点。

span.span: Moves one endpoint of a text range to the specified endpoint of a second text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要移动的终结点相交的相同的文本范围的其他终结点，则该其他终结点也会随，从而导致退化范围，并确保正确的终结点的顺序 (即，始终是小于或等于).If the endpoint being moved crosses the other endpoint of the same text range then that other endpoint is moved also, resulting in a degenerate range and ensuring the correct ordering of the endpoints (that is, is always less than or equal to ). ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1072](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1072)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2072](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2072)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int MoveEndpointByUnit (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int count);

.method public hidebysig instance int32 MoveEndpointByUnit(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function MoveEndpointByUnit (endpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint, unit As TextUnit, count As Integer) As Integer
public: int MoveEndpointByUnit(System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextUnit unit, int count);

param.name: endpoint
param.span: 要移动的端点。

span.span: The endpoint to move.

param.name: unit
param.span: 移动时使用的文本单位。

span.span: The textual unit for moving.

param.name: count
param.span: 要移动的单元的数量。

span.span: The number of units to move.

param.span: 正值表示向前移动端点。

span.span: A positive count moves the endpoint forward.

param.span: 负值表示向后移动端点。

span.span: A negative count moves backward.

param.span: 0 值表示不做任何移动。

span.span: A count of 0 has no effect.

summary.span: 在文档范围内将文本范围的一个端点移动指定数量的 。

span.span: Moves one endpoint of the text range the specified number of s within the document range.

returns.span: 实际移动的单位数，如果移动端点时遇到了文档的开始或结尾，则可能小于请求移动的单位数。

span.span: The number of units actually moved, which can be less than the number requested if moving the endpoint runs into the beginning or end of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要遍历文本范围的内容，为使 方法成功执行，将在后台进行一系列步骤。When it is necessary to traverse the content of a text range, a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the method to execute successfully. 1. 对文本范围进行了规范化。也就是说，已在 终结点将文本范围折叠为退化范围，这使得 终结点成为多余。The text range is normalized; 的文本范围已检索到所有文本内容之前这是以递归方式。This can be accomplished by calling to obtain an for each embedded object and then calling to obtain a text range for each element; this is done recursively until all textual content has been retrieved. ![文本范围跨越的嵌入对象。](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "文本范围跨越的嵌入对象。")![Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.") 含有嵌入对象及其范围跨度的文本流示例Example of a text stream with embedded objects and their range spans 将推迟到下一个最大支持的如果给定控件不支持。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 顺序，从最小单位到最大值，如下所示。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - - ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1073](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1073)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2073](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2073)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveFromSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 从支持多个不连续文本选择的文本容器中的某个已有突出显示文本集合中，移除与调用文本范围的 和 端点对应的突出显示文本部分。

span.span: Removes a highlighted section of text, corresponding to the calling text range and endpoints, from an existing collection of highlighted text in a text container that supports multiple, disjoint selections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本插入点会将移动到已删除突出显示的区域。The text insertion point will move to the area of the removed highlight. 提供的退化文本范围将插入点。Providing a degenerate text range will move the insertion point.

exception.span: 如果文本提供程序不支持选择多个不连续的文本范围（例如， 的值必须为 ）。

span.span: If text provider does not support multiple, disjoint selections (for example, must have a value of ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ScrollIntoView(bool alignToTop) cil managed

param.name: alignToTop
param.span: 如果文本控件应该滚动以便文本范围与视区顶部对齐，则为 ；如果应该与视区底部对齐，则为 。

span.span: if the text control should be scrolled so the text range is flush with the top of the viewport; if it should be flush with the bottom of the viewport.

summary.span: 导致文本控件垂直滚动，直到文本范围在视区中可见。

span.span: Causes the text control to scroll vertically until the text range is visible in the viewport.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尊重隐藏和显示文本。 respects both hidden and visible text. UI 自动化客户端可以检查文本可见性。The UI Automation client can check the for text visibility. 如果文本区域处于隐藏状态，仅当隐藏的文本包含视区中的定位点，将滚动文本控件。If the text range is hidden, the text control will scroll only if the hidden text has an anchor in the viewport. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1074](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1074)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2074](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2074)]

span.span: If scrolling is not supported by the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Select() cil managed

summary.span: 突出显示文本控件中与文本范围的 和 端点对应的文本。

span.span: Highlights text in the text control corresponding to the text range and endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供的退化文本范围，则会将文本插入点移动到的文本范围的终结点。If a degenerate text range is provided, the text insertion point will move to the endpoint of the text range. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1075](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1075)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2075](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2075)]

exception.span: 在文本控件不支持文本选择时发生。

span.span: Occurs when text selection is not supported by the text control.

summary.span: 获取与文本范围关联的 。

The text provider.
